thread.section_title: DesignCrowd Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DesignCrowd | designcrowd.com
thread.title: Mimoza

author: Mimoza
title: Mimoza
text:
I'm truly impressed by the designers from all around the world and the talent that's out there.
Most of them have been very responsive and the hardest was to choose the best two designs out of 184!!!
Thank you Design Crowd team for running such an amazing business. I would definitely highly recommend you to all my contacts.
Also thank you to my two designers Alpino from Indonesia and Claire W from New Zealand . I'm sure I will be using your services in the near future.
